section.name: Installing Plug-ins
section.p:
Installing plug-ins in Jameleon should require the following steps:
Copy all files in the plug-in's lib directory to your local directory that holds all libraries like jar, dll, or zip files
Set plugins entry in jameleon.conf
Be sure to see the install documentation on the plug-ins for more specifics.
